name: Under the See
description:
Made for the RCS Game Jam

You are trapped in an underwater lab run by sharks and you have to escape all while remaining under their sight!

WASD to move

Left-click to shoot at mouse

E to skip through text

Get to the ladders in the top left of a level to beat it

Dragondoodler222 - Music, Programming, Level  Design

Guzzzzzz - Art, SFX

Fireball and Bubble SFX from https://opengameart.org/content/
